author: Jane Dalton, Jane Dalton
title: Coronavirus: 'Exotic' skins in shoe and handbag fashion stores fuel risk of further epidemics, say experts
description: Stop the Wildlife Trade exclusive​: 'Before Covid-19 few people knew about China's 22,000 legal captive-breeding facilities,​ but any industry with humans handling exotic animals poses a risk​,' says expert
content:
An international trade in skins of exotic species such as pythons, stingrays and crocodiles for luxury fashion accessories such as bags and boots increases the risk of dangerous viruses spreading to humans, conservationists are warning.
Goods such as shoes, … [+6774 chars]
